title: 3 and Out - OBJ to Rams Overreaction, Carolina's Cam Desperation, Russ vs. Rodgers, Week 10 Preview
itunes:title: 3 and Out - OBJ to Rams Overreaction, Carolina's Cam Desperation, Russ vs. Rodgers, Week 10 Preview
description:
John reacts to OBJ signing with the Rams, if Odell can fit in as a third option, why the Panthers bringing back Cam Newton feels desperate, the many similarities and differences between Russell Wilson and Aaron Rodgers as they set to face off this week. He also previews the top matchups from NFL Week 10 and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag!

Subscribe NOW and make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
